text.__SUMMARY__: Justicia tocantina (syn. Chaetothylax tocantinus Nees, and Justicia tocantinus (Nees) V.A.W.Graham) is a plant native to Argentine, and the Cerrado vegetation of Brazil. This plant is cited in Flora Brasiliensis by Carl Friedrich Philipp von Martius.
text.See also: List of plants of Cerrado vegetation of Brazil
